actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the building located at 15 Henry Street in Binghamton, New York, as the "Kevin J. Tarsia Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the building located at 15 Henry Street in Binghamton, New York, as the Kevin J. Tarsia Federal Building and United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the building located at 15 Henry Street in Binghamton, New York, as the "Kevin J. Tarsia Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
